ygData.subject: on being well dressed (if nothing less)
ygData.msgSnippet: Just FYI on The Nameless: Spotting in Misty: level 5 1/2 elf bard doing his best smurf impression accompanied by similar level halfling warrior in odd sky blue
ygData.messageBody:
Just FYI on The Nameless:

Spotting in Misty: level 5 1/2 elf bard doing his best smurf impression
accompanied by similar level halfling warrior in odd sky blue armor.

I just shook my head in disbelif - Nameless went up Oct 20. =)

-GW
<Tork@Nameless>

PS: HOWTO: Twist bard songs will be updated with an advanced twisting
section focusing on the use of instruments in the next day or so. I just
finished taking all the screen caps (it is NOT easy to twist, click down
instrurments, etc and then reach over and smash the - key so some of the
caps have been... doctored!)
